00035 bool Sphere::contains_point(boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> point) const {
00036     //Point is contained if
00037     //(point.x - position.x)^2 + (point.y - position.y)^2 + (point.z - position.z)^2 <= r^2
00038     /*
00039      * TODO implement using type Vector3d

00041         pow(point[1]-position_[1], 2) +
00042         pow(point[2]-position_[2], 2) <= pow(radius_, 2) )
00043         return true;
00044     else*/
